name: Granny's Great Escape
description:
Granny's Great Escape

Help your Granny to build a rocket and flee from the old people's home! Find a rocket-engine, a few fuselages and a nose cone to construct your rocket on the launchpad. But be careful, the nurse-guards don't like it, when the residents push and pull the inventory around. And stay away from the kitchen!!

made by 
  • Gina Voerde (@RainbowRatArt)
  • Arne von Öhsen (@ArneVonOehsen)
  • Lukas Höppner (@Wuschli)
additional assets
  • Kenney - https://kenney.nl/
